intro:
From beginner to advanced!
Challenge various modes! !
description:
"TETRIS® THE ABSOLUTE THE GRAND MASTER 2 PLUS" is a puzzle game released by ARIKA in 2000.
This work has been further enhanced with new modes added from the previous work.
Challenge your own limits with "TGM+" where Tetriminos rise up from the bottom and "T.A.DEATH" where Tetriminos fall at a high speed from the beginning.

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
